column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last Friday , I went grocery shopping as I do every Friday .
#text=The first thing I did was looked around the house to see what all I needed from the grocery store .
#text=I always make a list to make sure I do n't forget anything .
#text=I went to the grocery store about lunch time .
#text=When I got to the store , I made sure I had my list and money and got out of my car .
#text=I went in and got a buggy .
#text=As I went through the store , I got things on my list to last me through the week .
#text=I put things like fruit , milk , bread , eggs , and snacks in my buggy .
#text=I also got some things that I can make meals with , like meat , vegetables , and macaroni and cheese .
#text=When I was done getting everything on the list , I headed to the front of the store .
#text=There was a line at the cash register , so I got in line to wait my turn .
#text=Once it was my turn , I put all of my items onto the counter for the cashier to ring up .
#text=She was a very sweet young girl and made conversation while ringing up my groceries .
#text=After she rung up and scanned everything , I paid her and got my things back into my buggy .
#text=I headed to the car to put my groceries in the trunk and return the buggy .
#text=It was a nice and quick grocery trip .
